title: FIFA World Cup winner 's prize money 2018
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the number of inmate deaths in ireland in the united kingdom ( uk ) from 2015 to 2016 . In 2014 , there were a total of 2 million automobiles registered a day , an increase from 80 million in the previous year .
gold: This statistic shows the prize money awarded to the winner of the FIFA World Cup from 2002 to 2018 . The winner of the 2014 World Cup was given 35 million U.S. dollars in prize money .
